attributes.action: ensure that the housing supply is restricted to the extend no swathes of greenbelt will be lost forever due to ghastly 1 or 2 bed flats.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many local pubs and large gardens are being converted to cater for monstrous large buildings full of flats which local services find hard to sustain and change the landscape of brown and greenbelt forever. This has to stop as house prices come in cycles - losing our greenbelt doesnt.
